name: VR 東方靈異入感 (Touhou Reiijukan) ~ Virtual responsive to Reality
name_original: VR 東方靈異入感 (Touhou Reiijukan) ~ Virtual responsive to Reality
description:
東方靈異入感 ~ Virtual responsive to Reality

A festival is held in Gensôkyô for way too long. Can you stop it? In this game, we propose you to incarn Reimu Hakurei in a VR experience, and to discover and smash the festival with the help of her Yin-Yang Orb. Be careful of Yukari, though!

This game is our submission for the Touhou game Jam 6, with the theme “Combo”. Note : For those who don't have VR you can find a video showing the game.
There are Unfortunately some technical errors in the build, however you should be able to run it perfectly through a Unity Editor "EiZiscene", you can find all the assets of the game in its github, here : Geoodees/Touhou-Reiijukan-Virtual-Responsive-to-Reality: VR Experience for HTC Vive with destructable enviroment (github.com)

We are still working on it and will submit an nice executable for you all to enjoy in the near future!

Commands : 

  • Hand with Stick : 

Trigger : Attack

  • Hand without Stick :

Grip : Grab object Trigger : Throw a talisman Menu button : Resets the level

Track Pad Up : Teleport Track Pad Right : Summons the orb back

Track Pad Down : Grab object

Credits :

Team Lead : ApricotWTF

Game Design : ApricotWTF

Music : Asari

Sound : Klim

Art : Anoranacc, Greenscarf, MacAonghais, Friedrich Landsknecht

Programming : Geoodees, EiZi, ApricotWTF

Physics : Geoodees

Dialogs : Patchoulidere.C
